import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; // Import Axios import "../css/aboutus.css"; const AboutUs = () => { const [reviews, setReviews] = useState([]); // Fetch reviews from the backend useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/reviews') // Adjust URL if needed .then((response) => { setReviews(response.data); // Set the fetched reviews to state }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error fetching reviews:', error); }); }, []); return (

))}

★ {review.rating}
{review.review_text} {new Date(review.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}

))}

); }; export default AboutUs;
